Pembroke_Pines.WFOR-TV: WFOR-TV, virtual channel 4 (UHF digital channel 22), is a CBS owned-and-operated television station licensed to Miami, Florida, United States and also serving Fort Lauderdale. The station is owned by the CBS Television Stations subsidiary of CBS Corporation, as part of a duopoly with MyNetworkTV affiliate WBFS-TV (channel 33). The two stations share studio and office facilities in Doral, Florida, near Miami International Airport; WFOR's transmitter is located in Andover, Florida.
